body: Nani, I just realize that the driver dude that the wife was having a conversation with looks a lot like Yoshikage Kira.😐

So let me get this straight, the man from that night inside of her workshop doesn't know that he is hitting on a married women? Are we gonna ignore the fact that wife technically cheated on her husband by romanticizing about being love with the man? What's even worst is that the sister-in-law didn't told her boyfriend that her brother-in-law raped her, throughout the entire conversation I was hoping the boyfriend would sense out of the guy for doing that to his gal. Bruh, where is the netorare, incest, cheating, and rape tags when you needed the most???
